name: VaporRunner
description:
Welcome to VaporRunner!

Run as far as you can whilst you dodge every object.  Every Pink obstacle is rewindable and your score will be calculated on distance traveled and rewinded objects. Have fun!


Controls:

A and D - Horizontal Movement

Space - Jump

Left Control - Slide

Left Mouse Click - Rewind

EDIT: Thanks for the feedback! Here's some changes we know about and would like to edit in a future update:

- Add more settings.

- Add W/S as primary controls and SPACE/CTRL as secondary controls.

- Rethink the speed as to let as many people enjoy the game.
